attributes.action: give aid to the innocent victims of Palestine and end the war.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want support for the innocent victims of Palestine.They deserve our help aid wise. Money, medical staff, food, water etc. Young children, men and women are all being subjected to awful trauma and suffering the worst kind of pain ever, losing loved ones and so many innocent people being severly injured or even murdered. We believe that this is against human righs and how Israelis have behaved is absolutely disgusting and MUST bt stopped. Palestine is a very poor country and unable to help themselves however, with our aid something can be done to help the innocent victims.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
